mapper.select:
select p.id, p.name, p.carousel from sale_act p
order by p.id desc

select p.id,p.name,p.base_price,p.category_id,c.name categoryName from sale_act p left join sys_act_category c on c.id=p.category_id
order by p.id desc

select a.id AS act_id,CONCAT(a.`name`, '-',saa.name) AS act_name,saa.id AS attr_id, saa.target_num AS target_num, p.start_time, p.end_time, a.portrait from sale_act_price p join sale_act a on p.act_id=a.id JOIN sale_act_attr saa ON saa.act_id = a.id JOIN front_apply_act faa ON faa.id = a.apply_act_id where p.delete_flag=0 and p.forbid_flag=0 and p.review_status=1 AND faa.client_id = #{clientId} order by a.display_weight desc,p.id desc

select a.id AS act_id,CONCAT(a.`name`, '-',saa.name) AS act_name,saa.id AS attr_id, saa.target_num AS target_num, p.start_time, p.end_time,a.portrait from sale_act_price p join sale_act a on p.act_id=a.id JOIN sale_act_attr saa ON saa.act_id = a.id JOIN front_apply_act faa ON faa.id = a.apply_act_id JOIN sale_act_order sao ON sao.attr_id = saa.id AND (sao.status = 2 OR sao.status = 4) where p.delete_flag=0 and p.forbid_flag=0 and p.review_status=1 AND faa.client_id = #{clientId} order by a.display_weight desc,p.id desc
